scripts.evm:start: docker compose -f devops/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d evm --build && sleep 5
scripts.contracts:up: npm run evm:start && npm run subtensor:start && npm run contracts:evm:deploy && npm run contracts:subtensor:deploy
scripts.contracts:down: npm run evm:stop && npm run subtensor:stop
scripts.environment:up: npm run contracts:up && npm run backend:start && npm run relayer:start
scripts.environment:down: npm run contracts:down && npm run backend:stop && npm run relayer:stop
